1114960.name: Corridor Crusaders
1114960.description:
In this action-packed arcade shooter, build the arena and then fight your opponents by calculating the bounces of your shots, manipulating the map, and dashing to safety!

In Corridor Crusaders, the PvP matches consist of a phase of building, where both players take turns placing tetris-like pieces on a grid to form the walls. Then, both players spawn on their map and battle each other in Arena-style combat. Pick your weapon, line up your shots, use rockets to destroy a wall, or dash around a corner to gain the advantage and eliminate your opponents.

Disclaimer
This game is an Indie game, and it is my first published game. Since it is free for everyone, the server isn't the greatest, and you may notice a little more lag than most games. The game is also only playable in online mode, so there must be a player queuing at the same time as you to enter a match. If nobody is currently online, try getting a friend to play the game with you! It's free, and it only takes a few seconds to download.
You can join the official Discord server and look for people to play with here:
Follow the YouTube channel to see any big updates:
